required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Deep Phenotyping of Rosacea and Migraine
clinical_study.official_title: Deep Phenotyping of Rosacea and Migraine

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to deep phenotype patients with rosacea and migraine

detailed_description.textblock:
Rosacea and migraine are common disorders that overlap in epidemiology, symptoms, trigger factors, and distribution in the trigeminal area. Recent studies establish a connection between the two disorders, which needs to be investigated.
The purpose of this study is investigate the link between the two disorders by deep phenotyping through semi-structured interviews.

primary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of migraine in rosacea cohort
primary_outcome.description: Prevalence of patients in rosacea cohort who fulfill diagnostic criteria for migraine

primary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of rosacea in migraine cohort Prevalence of rosacea in migraine cohort
primary_outcome.description: Prevalence of patients in migraine cohort who fulfill diagnostic criteria for rosacea

secondary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of migraine subtypes in rosacea cohort
secondary_outcome.description: Prevalence of patients in rosacea cohort who fulfill diagnostic criteria for subtypes of migraine according to international headache society classification

secondary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of rosacea subtypes in migraine cohort
secondary_outcome.description: Prevalence of patients in migraine cohort who fulfill diagnostic criteria for subtypes of rosacea

arm_group.description: Patients who have been diagnosed with rosacea
Patients who have been diagnosed with migraine

intervention.intervention_name: No intervention apart from tests, including interview

study_pop.textblock:
Rosacea
- patients invited to participate through 3 different clinics in Copenhagen and Zealand, Denmark
Migraine
- patients attending the outpatient clinic of the Danish Headache Center invited to participate

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- diagnosis with either rosacea and/or migraine
Exclusion Criteria:
- does not want to participate
- cannot co-operate to investigation

responsible_party.investigator_title: Principal Investigator, Medical Doctor, PhD Fellow
